tag_settings.required_primary_text: Enter the minimum and maximum number of primary tags that may be applied to a discussion.
tag_settings.required_secondary_text: Enter the minimum and maximum number of secondary tags that may be applied to a discussion.
tag_settings.title: Tag Settings

tags.about_tags_text: Tags are used to categorize discussions. Primary tags are like traditional forum categories: they can be arranged in a two-level hierarchy. Secondary tags do not have hierarchy or order, and are useful for micro-categorization.

all_tags.meta_description_text: แท็กทั้งหมด
